author: sussman
msg: Book work:  revamp the 'svnserve' section, which was very out-of-date.
* book/book/ch05.xml:  reorganize whole svnserve section, cover
missing topics like svn+ssh://, SVN_SSH, and others.
* book/TODO:  add some things, remove some things.

author: dwhedon
msg: * HACKING (APR pool usage conventions) : Fix  grammatical problem,

author: brane
msg: Some more Windows build tweaks, among which:
-- Add options to support Purify and Quantify instrumentation
-- Refactor the Apache module support now that we have mod_authz_svn, too
-- Generate debug symbols for the release build
* build.conf (mod_dav_svn, mod_authz_svn): Minor tweaks in the description.
(WinGeneratorBase.get_win_sources): Same again, and search the target
dependencies to get the list of sources instead of listing the deps
* build/generator/msvc_dsp.ezt (ADD CPP): Don't inline indiscriminately in
Release mode; generate debug info instead. Define APR_POOL_DEBUG if pool
(ADD LINK32): Always generate debug info. Add flag "/fixed:no" if Purify
This is an empty revision for padding.
